text: Henry Enrique "Erik" Estrada (born March 16, 1949) is an American actor and reserve police officer. He is best known for his co-starring lead role in the 1977â€“1983 American police television series CHiPs. Estrada was a contestant in the second season of The Surreal Life. ==References== ==Other websites== * Erik Estrada's website * * CBS Armed and Famous TV Show * Erik Estrada's California Pines infomercial review Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American police officers Category:The Surreal Life participants
title: Erik Estrada
